entry.title: Paper accepted! Paper titled DIWALI - Diversity and Inclusivity aWare cuLture specific Items for India: Dataset and Assessment of LLMs for Cultural Text Adaptation in Indian Context accepted at EMNLP 2025.

entry.title: Paper accepted! Paper titled MorphTok: Morphologically Grounded Tokenization for Indic languages accepted at ICML 2025 Tokenization Workshop (TokShop). Work done in collaboration with IIT Bombay and IIT Mandi.

entry.title: Humbled to receive the ACL Diversity and Inclusion Award (D&I Award). Making in-person attendance of EMNLP 2023 possible. Heartfelt thanks to the D&I team.
